content.executive_summary: Annual risk assessment of internal controls over financial reporting as required by SOX 404, identifying key risks and control effectiveness.
key_risks: Revenue recognition complexity in multi-currency operations
IT system access controls and segregation of duties
Third-party vendor access to financial systems
Change management controls for system modifications
material_weaknesses: Inadequate change management controls for financial systems
Weak vendor access controls and monitoring
content.remediation_plan: Implement enhanced change management and vendor controls by Q2 2025
